data.meta_description: Buy Heart's Desire 1936 on DVD-R today! Rare classic drama film from 1936 starring Richard Tauber, Leonora Corbett, Carl Harbord, Paul Graetz, Kathleen Kelly
data.text:
Starring Richard Tauber, Leonora Corbett, Carl Harbord, Paul Graetz, Kathleen Kelly

Directed by Paul L. Stein

Print: Black and White

Runtime: 82 min.

Genre: drama

World-renowned operatic tenor Richard Tauber not only starred in Heart's Desire, but also wrote most of the songs. Tauber is cast as Joseph Steidler, a popular but relatively unknown Vienesse beer-garden singer. Discovered by a show-biz entrepreneur, Steidler is suddenly catapulted to fame and fortune. Alas, in the process he loses his sweetheart Anna (Kathleen Kelly) tossing her aside in favor of glamorous socialite Frances (Leona Wilson). By the time Steidler learns that he's out of his depth in High Society, it's almost too late. Filmed in 1935, Heart's Desire made it to American shores in 1937.
